overview_of_class:
In DSGN246 students explore the NX system in broader scope and greater depth, gaining more hands-on experience in modern techniques and best practices while building on the fundamentals learned in the prerequisite DSGN 245 or ME 240.

Intro to 3D CAD: NX I and Intro to 3D CAD: NX II together equal one full unit of credit.

This course may not be repeated for credit.
name: Introduction to Computer Aided Design II: NX
title: MEAS DSGN 246-0-20 Introduction to Computer Aided Design II: NX

instructors.instructor_addr: Segal Design Institute, Rm FORD G302, 2133 Sheridan Road, EV CAMPUS
